title: Sally Hansen Eyebrow, Face & Lip Wax, Microwaveable,  wax 1.25 oz (35 g), Extrasoothe lotion 0.5 fl oz (14.7 ml)
description: Mistake proof. Results last up to 8 weeks. With mini tweezers & brow guides. No strips needed. Topical analgesic with 5% benzocaine. Contains: wax [1.25 oz (35 g)], Extrasoothe skin relief lotion [0.5 fl oz (14.7 ml)], brow guides, temperature indicator applicator, mini tweezers. Post treatment soothing lotion with 5% benzocaine. Perfect for: face; eye brows; chin/lip. Dermatologist tested. Salon tested. Eyebrow, Face & Lip Wax quickly and effectively removes unwanted facial hair. Easy to use - just apply and peel away! Warms in seconds in the microwave - Safe-Touch temperature sensitive spatula tells you when it's ready to use. Mini tweezer is included to lift away hard-to-remove hairs with precision. Eyebrow, Face & Lip Wax removes the entire hair with the bulb of the root. Smoothness lasts - up to 8 weeks! Extrasoothe skin relief lotion with benzocaine helps relieve minor discomfort and pampers skin with vitamin E. Wax: Made in USA. Brow Guides: Made in USA. Applicator: Made in USA. Mini Tweezers: Made in China.
